name: Lar
storyline:
You are a journalist who has just been fired, looking for a new, cheap and isolated home. The perfect opportunity has arisen: a house in a country town you've never heard of.

The person who was going to show you the house didn't show up, but a mysterious note on the gate gave you the key to enter what will soon become a nightmare.

Explore the house, solve puzzles and discover, little by little, the mysteries that inhabit this Lar.
summary: Lar is a horror-themed puzzle game currently being developed by one person using Unreal Engine 5.
